text: June Louise Squibb (born November 6, 1929) is an American actress. She has played supporting roles in movies like Alice, Scent of a Woman, The Age of Innocence, In & Out, and Far from Heaven.June Squibb (1929-) biography She was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for Nebraska in 2013.Oldest Supporting Actress Winners, Oscars.org accessed 3/6/2022 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:20th- century American actors Category:21st-century American actors Category:Converts to Judaism Category:Disney people
title: June Squibb
